title: Basler Theater (B le he Er)
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
description: Building on the previous poster design, randomly placed, brightly colored images of the Liberty Bell, a patriot firing a long rifel, a large yellow rose next to a figure of a man with a spade,are all connected by scatered dotted lines and bright areas of color. In addition, a large dump truck and several more brightly colored areas have been incorporated into the design.  At lower left a large letter B in blue and the letters he also in blue at lower right, as in the previous object, with the addition of the letters le inserted at bottom of sheet.
name: Poster
